title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - PMDG Boeing 737-700 - Using the different pushback modes
description:
Earlier this week PMDG released the Boeing 737-700 for MSFS. The aircraft is delivered with a lot of additional functionalities which we haven't seen yet from other vendors. In this video we are going to review the different methods of pushback which are available and what you can configure to influence the pushback.

00:00 intro
00:10 straight out pushback
06:47 L form pushback
09:39 Dot I pushback
12:25 T form pushback
16:48 free mode pushback

If you also want to give the aircraft a try you can download it from the site below:
https://pmdg.com/pmdg-737-700-for-microsoft-flight-simulator/
